# isMainThread

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is the main thread.

## Declaration

```swift
var isMainThread: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver is the main thread, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Working with the Main Thread

- **isMainThread**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the current thread is the main thread.
- **main**: Returns the `NSThread` object representing the main thread.
